name: Box Factory Escape
description:
English

Boxti is a box that takes on a life of its own, and realizing that he is in a factory, he decides to escape from it. Beat the different levels to escape from the factory. There are 4 levels available, each one more difficult than the previous one!

Español

Boxti es una caja que cobro vida propia, y al darse cuenta que está en una fábrica decide escapar de esta. Supera los distintos niveles para escapar de la fábrica. Hay 4 niveles disponibles cada uno más difícil que el anterior!
